name: GardenVR
description:
INTRO 

GardenVR is an application made to teach you in an interactive and funny way the art of gardening!

You’ll enter the world of a little mediterranean garden, and, helped by grandpa Otto, you’ll learn how to grow tomato plants!

The first part “Impara con il Nonnino” is about the growth and cure of tomato plants, from sowing to harvest! You’ll be teached step by step by the grandpa about the techniques and instruments to grow and cure your tomato plant.

In the second part “Testa le tue abilità” you’ll challenge yourself with what you’ve learned and gain points for your results!

TRY TO GROW AND HARVEST AS MANY TOMATOES AS YOU CAN IN THE GIVEN TIME!!

TEAM

This application was developed by Federica Bono, Alberto Bruno, Biagio Casciaro and Kamyar Mohammadreza for the Politecnico di Torino course: Realtà Virtuale 2020/21.

This application is in italian.
